parameters.description: The request header to specify which App in the component will be used to process the request. This is typically the Mobeix X-App-ID.

parameters.name: X-Request-By
parameters.description: The request header to capture the user ID initiating the request for auditing purposes. If not provided, the auditor will be defaulted to 'RestAPI'.

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: The request header to correlate HTTP requests between a client and server. If not provided, a random ID will be generated.

parameters.name: X-Tenant-ID
parameters.description: The request header to specify which tenant in the multi-tenancy component will be used to process the request. This is typically the Mobeix Merchant ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specific code with which the workflow id has been created automatically.
